esp:page.esp:name: Kings and Scholars
esp:page.esp:title: Kings and Scholars: Politics and Science in the Ancient Assyrian city of Kalhu (Nimrud)

body.p: On Tuesday 21 January 2014, Eleanor Robson gave a lunch-time gallery talk to a packed audience of around 70 people in the British Museum's Room 6. She spoke about politics and science in ancient Kalhu (Nimrud), among the stone sculptures from the city's palaces and temples.
British Museum visitors got another chance to hear Eleanor's talk on Assyrian kings and scholars on Friday 27 June 2014.
